name: The Valley
description:
The Valley is a magic based RPG game with a story elements, puzzles, platforming, and engaging combat.

Rise from the dead and fix the mistakes of the past. Adventure through the valley and unlock many of the secrets it holds. Help the locals rebuild their destroyed village and destroy the corrupted that threaten the land. Solve puzzles, explore ruins, and traverse the platform terrain of The Valley. Find the missing pages of your spell tome to relearn the destructive spells you once created. Gather ingredients, create potions, and defeat the enemies that lurk through out the world.

Experiance the story of The Valley, and save the land from further corruption.
